name: Courtyard by Marriott Republic Airport Long Island/Farmingdale

reviews.title: Very nice, clean new hotel
reviews.text: I stayed here on 11/7 for an overnight business trip. The hotel is only 5 months old and was very clean, bright and obviously updated. The lobby was quite spacious and bright and had a nice bar area. They also have a breakfast for 9.99 that is nice in the morning (fresh fruit, pastries, toast, eggs, omelets, waffles). The room is spacious and nicely appointment. The rooms have wi-fi. I'd recommend this hotel in a heartbeat!

My husband and I stayed here on our wedding night, as did a handfull of our guests. Our suite was huge, with a large living room and kitchen area separate from the bedroom. The kitchen area came complete with microwave, sink, and refrigerator. Our bed was exquisitely comfortable with tons of pillows- after a fun filled, but exhausting, day, it was the perfect place to rest our heads. The hotel provided all of us with a complimentary shuttle to and from the reception hall. For a small fee ($100), they kept that bar open for us until 1:00am, allowing us to keep the party going a little longer. The breakfast buffet in the morning was great- omelette and waffle stations, hash browns, bacon, sausage, fruits, cereals, and more- just about something for everyone- and they kept it open until 11:00am- later than most hotels I've ever stayed at. I really had no complaints at all.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

reviews.text: The location is great for staying in Long Island; it is on Route 110 which is lined from North to South with stores and businesses of all sorts, and is intersected by every major highway. It is a perfect home base to get to any of the area beaches, as long as you have a car. Between the level of comfort and their friendly accomaodating staff, I would recommend this hotel for all ages, for business or for pleasure. They definitely gave us the perfect evening to end our perfect day!
